channel.title: Runserver help
channel.description:
Hey guys, i got a windows 8 laptop for christmas and i ned some help with my runserver, it works on my xp pc but not with my windows 8. please help me heres the runserver code...
[code]@echo off color 0a title GolemXScape RUN java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
please fix it and make it work for windows 8, thanks

item.title: Runserver help
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

idk how to change the file spot or whatever can u tell me how

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver help
item.dc:creator: @jesteampro jesteampro
item.description:
@jesteampro wrote:

You need to set the path to your java this way :
Control Panel -> System -> Advanced System settings -> Environement variables -> Edit Path and add this at the end. (Do not add “;” if there is already one.)

It might change if your using different java version (jre6) or running it x64 bits

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver help
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

advertisemant tooken out… nd btw cani have a link for my java to download or could you tell me what to type for my java i have java 7 update 10

thanks

item.dc:creator: @jesteampro jesteampro
item.description:
@jesteampro wrote:

You need to set the path to your java and remove this advertising.

item.description:

yes i have java, maybe you could help me from team viewer.
the error :

press any key to continue…

btw my compiler works…

item.title: Runserver help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

This is advertisement considering you included a link to your forums at the bottom, server advertisement isn’t allowed in this section. As to your question, have you downloaded and installed Java on your Windows 8 computer?

Read full topic
